problem.markdown:
>>Which two ways connect a slicer to an existing pivot table?<<
[ ] From PivotTable Tools’ Analyze tab, select Options. [x] From PivotTable Tools’ Analyze tab, select Filter Connections. [x] From Slicer Tools’ Options tab, select Report Connections. [ ] From Slicer Tools’ Options tab, select Slicer Settings.
[explanation] The second and third options are correct. [explanation]
problem.p: Which two ways connect a slicer to an existing pivot table?
